appLauncher.description: Title of the application launcher in the browser.

appDesc.message: Local, no cloud based, web content scrapping with tagging support

addTagHelp.message: Multiple tags should be separated with comma. Tags should have a minimum length of 2 characters and should not contain special characters such as spaces, #, / or \.

saveScreenshotLabel.description: Label of the take screenshot button

saveScreenshotTitle.message: Take a screenshot of the visible page area as PNG
saveScreenshotTitle.description: Title of the take screenshot button

saveAsMhtmlLabel.description: Label of the save as MHTML button

saveAsMhtmlTitle.message: Save complete page (including images) as one MHTML file, preserving the original design
saveAsMhtmlTitle.description: Title of the save as MHTML button

savePageAsHtmlLabel.description: Label of the save as html button

savePageAsHtmlTitle.message: Save complete page (including images) as one HTML file, the original design will not be preserved
savePageAsHtmlTitle.description: Title of the save as html button

saveBookmarkTitle.message: Save a bookmark of the current page as Windows compartible URL file

saveSelectionAsHtmlTitle.message: Save selected content (including images) as one HTML file

downloadTitle.message: Download the file in its original file format
